  • æ¨èè°·æ­Œå•†åº—App: App Cloner

entry.content:
ä¸€åŠ æ‰‹æœºè‡ªå¸¦å¤‡ä»½æ¢å¤è½¯ä»¶BanckupRestore ä¸€åŠ æ¬å®¶, å¯ç”¨æ¥ï¼š

entry.title: Arba Cryptocurrency Wallet
entry.content:
Like & recommend this â€œArba bitcoin walletâ€. ä»¥ä¸‹æ•´ç†ä¸ºåŸåˆ›ã€‚

ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼š

  • åˆå¿ƒï¼švision - å®ç°100%å»ä¸­å¿ƒåŒ–çš„æ•°å­—é“¶è¡Œã€‚ğŸ‘

  • ç®€å•ï¼šå‰å°çš„è®¾è®¡ç®€å•æ˜“ç”¨ï¼Œçœ‹ä¸åˆ°â€æŠ€æœ¯â€çš„å½±å­ã€‚

  • ä¾¿åˆ©ï¼š

    • 30ç§æ•°å­—è´§å¸ + 52ç§æ³•å¸ã€‚
      • æ”¯æŒ native å››ç§æ•°å­—è´§å¸ï¼šbtc/bch/lte/eth (å³æ”¯æŒè¿™å››ç§çš„åŸç”Ÿé’±åŒ…åœ°å€) ã€‚
      • å…¶ä»–26ç§æ•°å­—è´§å¸å’Œ52ç§æ³•å¸: é€šè¿‡appå†…çš„exchangeâ€œåˆæˆâ€å¯¹åº”å¸ç§ã€‚
      • æ‰€æœ‰exchangeï¼Œå®åˆ™é‡‡ç”¨â€œsmart contractâ€ï¼Œå³é”å®šç­‰å€¼çš„åŸnativeæ•°å­—å¸ç§ã€‚
        • å®˜ç½‘æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼šbtcé€šè¿‡â€euro contractâ€è½¬æ¢æˆeuroï¼Œä¹‹åç”¨æˆ·æƒ³å°†euroè½¬æ¢æˆethï¼Œå®é™…è¿‡ç¨‹æ˜¯ â€œconvert contractâ€ï¼šâ€redeem euro contractâ€ first -> â€œfix value of btcâ€ to the amount of eth = â€œcreate eth contractâ€.
        • smart contractï¼šä¿å­˜åœ¨åŒºå—é“¾ï¼Œå› æ­¤arbaéœ€è¦æ”¯ä»˜network mining feeï¼Œarbaå°†æ­¤è´¹ç”¨æŠ˜æ‘Šåˆ°exchange rateè½¬æ¢ç‡ä¸­ã€‚
          • å³ï¼Œâ€arba spread on exchange rateâ€åŒ…å«ä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š1) å®é™…å‘ç”Ÿçš„ network fee; 2) abraå®£ç§°å”¯ä¸€ç”¨æ¥ç›ˆåˆ©çš„è½¬æ¢ç‡å·®ä»·(ç”±arbaè‡ªå·±è®¾å®š)ã€‚


    • æ‰€æœ‰å¸ç§å¸‚åœºè¡Œæƒ…ï¼Œä¸€ç›®äº†ç„¶ï¼Œè¡Œæƒ…ä»·æ ¼å¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒ(æ¥è¿‘å…¨ç½‘è¾ƒä½ä»·æ ¼æ°´å¹³)ã€‚

 

  • â€œæ•°å­—é“¶è¡Œâ€, æ‰“é€šæ•°å­—è´§å¸å’Œæ³•å¸çš„è¿›ç¨‹ï¼š
    • ç›®å‰ï¼Œç¾å›½å’Œè²å¾‹å®¾ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è‡ªç”±åœ¨â€æ•°å­—è´§å¸ã€æ³•å¸â€ä¹‹é—´, depositã€withdraw from/to ä¼ ç»Ÿé“¶è¡Œã€‚
    • å…¶ä»–å›½å®¶ï¼Œæ“ä½œä¸Šæš‚æ— æ³•å’Œä¼ ç»Ÿé“¶è¡ŒæŒ‚é’©ã€‚
    • å…¶ä»–å›½å®¶ (éƒ¨åˆ†)ï¼Œå¯é€šè¿‡abraåˆä½œä¼™ä¼´simplexï¼Œä½¿ç”¨visa card ç›´æ¥è´­ä¹°btc, simplexæ”¶å–5%æ‰‹ç»­è´¹(min. 10usd)ã€‚
      • simplex ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼šé™é¢ç©ºé—´å¤§ï¼›æ²¡æœ‰èº«ä»½è®¤è¯ç­‰è¦æ±‚ã€‚

 

  • å®‰å…¨ï¼š
    • ç§é’¥/recovery phrase å®Œå…¨ç”±ç”¨æˆ·æŒæ¡(non-custodial wallet)ï¼Œarba æ— æ³•å¾—çŸ¥ã€‚
    • HD walletï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡depositæ•°å­—è´§å¸åï¼Œé’±åŒ…åœ°å€å˜è‡ªåŠ¨å˜æ›´ï¼Œå¥½å¤„ï¼šä¿æŠ¤éšç§ï¼Œ(æ—§çš„ä¾æ—§ç”Ÿæ•ˆ)ã€‚

 

  • è‰¯å¿ƒï¼š
    • zero fee: mining fee for withdrawã€no fee for depositã€zero fee for transfer inbetween arba a/c.
    • only fee from â€œspread on exchange rateâ€: Arbaåœ¨å¸ç§é—´è½¬æ¢(exchange)æ—¶, ä»è½¬æ¢ç‡ä¸Šè·åˆ©ã€‚


Information from Abra Official

1. All Transactions Must Confirm Via Blockchain

  • All underlying currency is BTC, and all transactions must confirm via blockchain.
  • Abra uses Bitcoin-based contracts to facilitate cryptocurrency and fiat investments on the blockchain.
  • This network fee is required to ensure your transaction is confirmed by the Bitcoin mining network.

 

2. Transaction Types

  • Send Funds (Scenario: Abraé’±åŒ…ä¹‹é—´ å‘é€)
    • Send Fiat
      • Merely choose â€˜send fundsâ€™ in the app, this would not be a withdrawal. Abra does not charge an Abra fee (inc. no network fee) to â€˜Send fundsâ€™ to another Abra wallet.
      • But still must be confirmed by blockchain.
    • Send BTC/LTC/BCH/ETH
      • Be charged a network fee to withdraw BTC/LTC/BCH/ETH from an Abra wallet and send to another Abra wallet.
      • A withdrawal will encounter a network fee.
    • Other Cryptocurrency Cannot Be Sent

 

  • Withdrawal (Scenario: Abraé’±åŒ…->å…¶ä»–æ•°å­—é’±åŒ… æç°)
    • A withdrawal will encounter a network fee
    • Abra currently support BTC/LTC/BCH/ETH withdrawal

 

  • Withdrawal (Scenario: Abraé’±åŒ…->Bank æç°)
    • Abra currently support BTC/LTC/BCH/ETH withdrawal; A withdrawal will encounter a network fee.
    • Support Fiat Transfer, no Abra fee (inc. no network fee); The charge fee depends on bank/third-party their own policy.
    • All above case must be confirmed by blockchain.

æ€»ç»“

  • Send/Transfer Fiat: no Abra fee (inc. no network fee);
  • Send/Transfer/Withdraw BTC/LTC/BCH/ETH: The actual transaction type is â€œA withdrawalâ€, a withdrawal will encounter a network fee.


Recommend Links

  1. Abra launches new multi-signature wallet for holding digital assets using Bitcoin
  2. How do Abraâ€™s synthetic currencies work?
  3. How non-custodial wallets let you be your own bank
  4. Abra Blog
  5. Abra Homepage
